name: Red Soul Shard
flavorText: This looks just like it was part of the infamous Red Soulstone. But that's impossible... It was destroyed long ago.
flavorTextHtml: This looks just like it was part of the infamous Red Soulstone. But that's impossible... It was destroyed long ago.

secondary.textHtml: Periodically struggle for control, unleashing a ring of Fire that inflicts 12,500% weapon damage to enemies it passes through. 12,500%
